channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2023100856
item.description:
Report X-2023100856

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unload found a wet hazmat and notified management to call QA and pack it in a salvage drum DescribePack: Loose lid DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: When QA found the loose lid they tightened it

item.title: Report X-2023100629
item.description:
Report X-2023100629

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-13T18:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-03
  • City: OMAHA
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading the trailer a package handler found a leaking hazmat and asked management to notify QA who packed it into a salvage drum and took it back to their cage DescribePack: one lid was loose DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: QA tightened the lid when they found it
